metadata.name: Heat wave
metadata.description:
Skala Kallonis is a village in the south of Lesbos, a Greek island. Due to the climate change Greece is exposed to more heat waves than ever.

This picture was taken during the summer of 2021, with temperatures above 40 degrees celsius (104 degrees Fahrenheit).

The villagers have no more option than waiting in the shadows during peak sun hours, as even walking is a bad idea.

â€”--

Title: Heat wave
Artist name: IKERTJE
Edition type: 1/1
Tags: #greece #heat #wave #heatwave #lesbos #village #summer #sun
